data.text: Enthusiastic frontend engineer with more than 5 years of commercial experience. Good at project development from scratch and improvement of existing solutions. Have analytical and investigative skills. Confidently understand how to build an MVP. Able to create full autonomy in frontend development. Strive to improve DX, automate code quality analysis. Familiar with unit economics. Ready to analyze business requirements, propose product and development flow improvements.

Looking for a professional workgroup to implement knowledge and gained experience, be a part of the “Big idea” project, grow and contribute, improve management and product skills to obtain a lead position in the future.

description.text: I took a significant part in the development of 5 new games for tens of thousands of users. Was engaged in code reviews, improving DX, refactoring of existing solutions, developing new big features
TypeScript, React, Mobx, RxJS, Inversify, Webpack, Protobuf, Jest, Kibana, Jenkins.

Successfully launched social app, and brand landings. Further evolution to a full-fledged product (with support, analytics, payments) was made. Had active participation in the hiring of technical specialists as an interviewer for various projects. Was a mentor for junior developers.
React, Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, Gatsby, TypeScript, WebSockets, GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Sentry, PRPL pattern.

In cooperation with a back-end developer, based on UX mockups successfully developed an application with a graphical representation of business processes in a BPMN and CMMN formats for immediate execution
React, Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, CMMN, BPMN, Docker.

Mobile-first, cross-browser, and SEO-friendly app for finding the closest money exchangers with a favorable rate was developed from scratch.
Developed service for medical members with real-time calls, pptx presentations, and schedule manager.
React, Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, Mapbox, WebSockets, WebRTC, Docker.
Participated in the development of a real-time crypto-currencies exchanger.
Under the supervision of a mentor, was developed a banking system and a lot of landing pages.
React, Redux, WebSockets, Gulp, Node.js, Ruby.

data.text: I’m familiar with fast prototyping and release MVP for early test ideas in the real world. It took me about 3 months to analyze requirements, set up development flow, and create the first social discovery MVP (with paying customers) version of the latest released project.
I’ve hacked a game dedicated to the contest at OdessaJS while sitting at the OdessaJS conference  😄
